title.phrase: Welcome to the home for my podcast, blog and portfolio.

about.title: About
about.hello: Hello, my name is Volodymyr (Pij) Pihol and this is my personal website
about.me: I'm {age} boy originally from Rivne, Ukraine. Working as Full stack Engineer, big fan of music, computer games and sometimes I'm making cool stuff, you would be able to find everything on this website :)
